item.title: Boardlight
item.description: Boardlight # User # FFuF was doing this so i added -c -fs 15949 ffuf -u http://board.htb -H "Host:FUZZ.board.htb" -w /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/DNS/subdomains-top1million-5000.txt -c -fs 15949 found a poc for authenticated rev shell so had to get in Googled default creds which were admin/admin and it worked made a test page with a rev and ran it got foothold now onto priv esc db name = dolibarr db username = dolibarrowner db password = serverfun2$2023!
